trans-unit.source: Change your StorSimple passwords | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Change your StorSimple passwords | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Describes how to use the StorSimple Manager service to change your StorSimple Snapshot Manager and device administrator passwords.
trans-unit.target: Describes how to use the StorSimple Manager service to change your StorSimple Snapshot Manager and device administrator passwords.

trans-unit.source: Use the StorSimple Manager service to change your StorSimple passwords
trans-unit.target: Use the StorSimple Manager service to change your StorSimple passwords

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: Overview

trans-unit.source: The Management Portal Configure page contains all the device parameters that you can reconfigure on a StorSimple device that is managed by a StorSimple Manager service.
trans-unit.target: The Management Portal Configure page contains all the device parameters that you can reconfigure on a StorSimple device that is managed by a StorSimple Manager service.

trans-unit.source: This tutorial explains how you can use the Configure page to change your StorSimple Snapshot Manager or device administrator password.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial explains how you can use the Configure page to change your StorSimple Snapshot Manager or device administrator password.

trans-unit.source: Change the StorSimple Snapshot Manager password
trans-unit.target: Change the StorSimple Snapshot Manager password

trans-unit.source: StorSimple Snapshot Manager software resides on your Windows host and allows administrators to manage backups of your StorSimple device in the form of local and cloud snapshots.
trans-unit.target: StorSimple Snapshot Manager software resides on your Windows host and allows administrators to manage backups of your StorSimple device in the form of local and cloud snapshots.

trans-unit.source: When configuring a device in StorSimple Snapshot Manager, you will be prompted to provide the device IP address and password to authenticate your storage device.
trans-unit.target: When configuring a device in StorSimple Snapshot Manager, you will be prompted to provide the device IP address and password to authenticate your storage device.

trans-unit.source: This password is first configured through the Windows PowerShell interface.
trans-unit.target: This password is first configured through the Windows PowerShell interface.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link><linkText>Step 3: Configure and register the device through Windows PowerShell for StorSimple</linkText><title></title></link> in <link><linkText>Deploy your on-premises StorSimple device</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link><linkText>Step 3: Configure and register the device through Windows PowerShell for StorSimple</linkText><title></title></link> in <link><linkText>Deploy your on-premises StorSimple device</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: The password that was first set through the Windows PowerShell interface during registration can then be changed via the Management Portal.
trans-unit.target: The password that was first set through the Windows PowerShell interface during registration can then be changed via the Management Portal.

trans-unit.source: Perform the following steps to change the StorSimple Snapshot Manager password.
trans-unit.target: Perform the following steps to change the StorSimple Snapshot Manager password.

trans-unit.source: To change the StorSimple Snapshot Manager password
trans-unit.target: To change the StorSimple Snapshot Manager password

trans-unit.source: In the portal, click Devices > Configure for your device.
trans-unit.target: In the portal, click Devices > Configure for your device.

trans-unit.source: Scroll down to the StorSimple Snapshot Manager section.
trans-unit.target: Scroll down to the StorSimple Snapshot Manager section.

trans-unit.source: Enter a password that is 14 or 15 characters.
trans-unit.target: Enter a password that is 14 or 15 characters.

trans-unit.source: Make sure that the password contains a combination of uppercase, lowercase, numeric, and special characters.
trans-unit.target: Make sure that the password contains a combination of uppercase, lowercase, numeric, and special characters.

trans-unit.source: Confirm the password.
trans-unit.target: Confirm the password.

trans-unit.source: Click Save at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: Click Save at the bottom of the page.

trans-unit.source: The StorSimple Snapshot Manager password should now be updated.
trans-unit.target: The StorSimple Snapshot Manager password should now be updated.

trans-unit.source: Change the device administrator password
trans-unit.target: Change the device administrator password

trans-unit.source: When you use Windows PowerShell interface to access the StorSimple device, you are required to enter a device administrator password.
trans-unit.target: When you use Windows PowerShell interface to access the StorSimple device, you are required to enter a device administrator password.

trans-unit.source: When the first StorSimple device is registered with a service, the default password for this interface is Password1.
trans-unit.target: When the first StorSimple device is registered with a service, the default password for this interface is Password1.

trans-unit.source: For the security of your data, you are required to change this password at the end of the registration process.
trans-unit.target: For the security of your data, you are required to change this password at the end of the registration process.

trans-unit.source: You cannot exit from the registration process without changing this password.
trans-unit.target: You cannot exit from the registration process without changing this password.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link><linkText>Step 3: Configure and register the device through Windows PowerShell for StorSimple</linkText><title></title></link> in <link><linkText>Deploy your on-premises StorSimple device</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link><linkText>Step 3: Configure and register the device through Windows PowerShell for StorSimple</linkText><title></title></link> in <link><linkText>Deploy your on-premises StorSimple device</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: The password that was first set through the Windows PowerShell interface during registration can then be changed via the Management Portal.
trans-unit.target: The password that was first set through the Windows PowerShell interface during registration can then be changed via the Management Portal.

trans-unit.source: Perform the following steps to change the device administrator password.
trans-unit.target: Perform the following steps to change the device administrator password.

trans-unit.source: To change the device administrator password
trans-unit.target: To change the device administrator password

trans-unit.source: In the portal, click Devices > Configure for your device.
trans-unit.target: In the portal, click Devices > Configure for your device.

trans-unit.source: Scroll down to the Device Administrator Password section.
trans-unit.target: Scroll down to the Device Administrator Password section.

trans-unit.source: Provide an administrator password that contains from 8 to 15 characters.
trans-unit.target: Provide an administrator password that contains from 8 to 15 characters.

trans-unit.source: The password must be a combination of uppercase, lowercase, numeric, and special characters.
trans-unit.target: The password must be a combination of uppercase, lowercase, numeric, and special characters.

trans-unit.source: Confirm the password.
trans-unit.target: Confirm the password.

trans-unit.source: Click Save at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: Click Save at the bottom of the page.

trans-unit.source: The device administrator password should now be updated.
trans-unit.target: The device administrator password should now be updated.

trans-unit.source: You can use this modified password to access the Windows PowerShell interface.
trans-unit.target: You can use this modified password to access the Windows PowerShell interface.

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Learn more about StorSimple security</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Learn more about StorSimple security</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Learn more about modifying your device configuration</linkText><title></title></link>.
